name: Vhol'Xo Ivorborough
description:
Description

The game is a simple dungeon game, with the addition of inventory management and character specialization, including blacksmith for upgrading weapons, trashbin to get rid of items, potion shop to strengthen yourself, and general store to cook food to gain buffs, with 3 different endings.

Patch Notes

3/17/2021 ver 0.8 beta release

3/18/2021 ver 0.9 beta patch 1

-attack sfx added

3/18/2021 ver 0.91 beta patch 2 (Unuploaded)

-added sfx provider and ost cover in credits

-added coin sfx

-mp point tweaks

-endurance tweaks

-added enemy spawn wait

-minor bug fixes

-added fullscreen function

-player health tweak

*(at the current build, there is no save and option system as of yet, and the game is still a buggy mess)
